21 GLASSHOUSE STREET

21 Glasshouse Street is a Grade II listed office building on Regent Street owned by the Crown Estate. I was a lead member working on the transformation to CAT A Office space which has now been let by Apple. The refurbishment has created 26,000 ft2 of exemplary office space with a BREEAM Excellent.


We inserted a new lift core which has enabled the relocation of the office entrance from Regent Street to Glasshouse Street unifying the existing retail street frontage that is dominant on Regent Street. I worked closely with Westminster City Council to create a unique bronze canopy that now frames the entrance. I also created the concept and brief for a carved solid stone desk that now sits in the reception and worked directly with stone sculptor Simon Hitchens from inception to completion. On the top floor we discovered an empty double height mansard which has been transformed into 4,000 ft2 of prime office space with full height glass sliding doors that lead out to terrace, meadow and dramatic views across London.
